sentences.english: When was the last time anyone mentioned microkernels in a conversation?
sentences.chinese: 你最後一次與人談話中提到微內核是什麼時候？

sentences.english: Three visualisations of nuclear combustion in a supernova.
sentences.chinese: 超新星內核燃燒的三種清晰呈像。

sentences.english: Why invoke a user-space application from the kernel?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要從內核調用用戶空間應用程序？

sentences.english: The executable that is hand-loaded and executed by the Kernel, namely the file server.
sentences.chinese: 手動載入並由內核執行的可執行體，即文件服務器。

sentences.english: The essence of Su Shi's Ci was to pursue freedom.
sentences.chinese: 追求自由，是東坡詞的本質內核。

sentences.english: How to enable my kernel to support CPU hotplug?
sentences.chinese: 該怎樣激活我的操作系統內核才能支持CPU熱插拔？

sentences.english: Next, look at your kernel config file.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，查看內核配置文件。

sentences.english: You have to use those cores.
The new kernel should now boot.
sentences.chinese: 新內核現在將引導起來。

sentences.english: At load time, the system loader then loads the bit-appropriate kernel extension.
sentences.chinese: 在加載時，系統加載器加載相應位的內核擴展。

sentences.english: The core is then placed in the pressure vessel.
sentences.chinese: 內核被放置在一個巨大的壓力管中。

sentences.english: The kernel itself is dynamic, and race conditions can be created in a number of ways.
sentences.chinese: 內核本身是動態的，而且有許多創建競態條件的方法。

sentences.english: The number of jiffies that this process has been scheduled in kernel mode.
sentences.chinese: 瞬間進程正在使用內核模式的數量。

sentences.english: Modifying the template to execute the desired kernel code is relatively straightforward.
sentences.chinese: 修改模板來執行期望的內核代碼相對也比較簡單。

sentences.english: The XNU kernel uses Mach at the core.
To execute these instructions, you need to switch to the kernel context.
sentences.chinese: 要執行這些指令，您必須切換到內核上下文。

definition: to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
